humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: In terms of the initial meaning of the configuration, the oracle bone inscriptions seem to follow the " Tian " instead of the " Tian ", and the lower is " Jie ". Xu Zhongshu thinks that it is a foreign body like a human head, which means that there is a ghost different from a stranger. Or add from " show " to show the meaning of ghosts and gods.

From " fontaine " to " person ", or from " Jie ", it is suspected that the spirit of a person dies and the soul comes out of the fontanelle (see He Linyi; see " fontaine "). The soul that leaves the body is a ghost. Or add "Êî¥" to show its awesomeness, and add " mouth " as decoration. The word " Ghost " in Xiaoyuding is omitted " Jie ", and " Ge " is added next to it.

As for the use cases, the oracle bone inscriptions represent gods and ghosts and are also used as the name of the country and people (Xu Zhongshu). Bronze inscriptions were used as the original meaning of ghosts. Chen [Bei Fang] Gui: "Gui (Gong), guilty of ghosts and gods, Bi Yan (Gong) ashamed (awe)." Also used as the name of the northwest tribe of Yin and Zhou, Liang Boge: "Ghost ". It is also used as " fear ", Qi Houping: "Yu Mi's heart and ghost (fear) chaste (ji)" (see " fear "). Also used as a name. In addition, "ghost salary" is the name of the penalty, named for the ancestral temple to collect firewood, and is punished for various kinds of labor.

"Zuo Zhuan. "The Five Years of Xi Gong": "Ghosts and gods are not real relatives, but morality is dependent." "Said Wen": "Ghosts, people are classified as ghosts. From people, like ghosts. Basic explanation of words
ghost
gu«ê
Some religious or superstitious people refer to the soul after death: ghosts. Ghostly. Ghosts (a. ghosts; b. insidious and harmful).
Insidious, not bright: nonsense. Ghost. ulterior motive.
A contempt or hate name for a person: drunkard. heavy smoker. Devils. miser.
Bad, bad (only attributive): ghost weather.
Smart, Minhui (many refers to children): ghosts and spirits.
A name that expresses affection: little devil. Clever.
Star name, one of twenty-eight places.
ghost
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[‚ë†]Ôºªgu«êÔºΩ
["Guangyun" Ju Weiqie, upper tail, see you. ]
(1) The superstitious believes that the soul is immortal after death, and calls it a ghost.
(2) Refers to being a ghost, death.
(3) Ancestors.
(4) Especially referring to the ancestors of the emperor, nobles and nobles who are no longer in the temple, and enjoy sacrifices in the altars and silos. Refer to "Book of Rites¬∑Sacrifice".
(5) The spirit of all things; ghosts.
(6) Contempt for a person.
(7) The nickname of the person.
(8) Describe bad and bad. It is often used as an idiot.
(9) It is called superstition in ghosts and gods.
(10) Cunning; clever.
(11) Explained as something that is not bright, an improper scheming.
(12) Unpredictable.
(13) Far; far away. See "Ghost Zone".
(14) The name of the stars. One of twenty-eight nights.
(15) Last name. In the ancient times, there were ghost districts. See "Historical Records ¬∑ Feng Chan Book".
